EmailTemplate.name: MiamiRE (RAMB) Introduction - 2nd Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Following Up: MiamiRE (RAMB) Introduction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Hope your week is going great! I wanted to follow up on the previous email. In order for us to display IDX data on your website, RAMB - Miami Association of RealtorsÂ® requires the agent to request the data access agreement on Bridge Interactive. Here is the instruction sheet to help you step by step with this process:Instructions.
Please submit the request at your earliest convenience.
Please let me know if you have any questions!
Best Regards,
